scripts.clear: powershell -Command "cd frontend; if (Test-Path .next) { rmdir /s /q .next }; if (Test-Path cache) { rmdir /s /q cache }"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.dev: npm run clear && concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run develop"
scripts.seed: cd backend && npm run strapi import -f ../seed-data.tar.gz
scripts.export: cd backend && npm run strapi export --no-encrypt -f ../seed-data
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
